title: Ticket #7884: Update condor_vacate man page
description:
The current condor_vacate man page is both a wasteland and misleading. It is misleading, because it mentions checkpointing, which is generally not a thing any more; it is a wasteland because of a vast lack of specificity as to what it actually does to jobs. Even just linking to the relevant section of the manual -- assuming we have one -- about what the different kind of vacates do and how they interact with various different config knobs (and job attributes), max job retirement time specifically included -- would be a vast improvement.

The text from condor_vacate_job might also be a good place to start.
creator: tlmiller
